code: import firebase from'../data/base';export var creatTodoList=function creatTodoList(value){firebase.firestore().collection('todo').add({task:value,completed:false});};export var deleteList=function deleteList(taskId){return firebase.firestore().collection('todo').doc(taskId).delete();};export var updateTask=function updateTask(value){firebase.firestore().collection('todo').doc(value.id).set({task:value.task,completed:value.completed});};export var markAllTask=function markAllTask(action){var db=firebase.firestore();db.collection('todo').get().then(function(snapshot){snapshot.docs.forEach(function(doc){db.collection('todo').doc(doc.id).set({task:doc.data().task,completed:action});});});};
